CapabilityConfiguration.description: The JSON document that defines the gateway capability's configuration.

CapabilityNamespace.description: The namespace of the capability configuration.

GatewayCapabilitySummary.description: Contains a summary of a gateway capability configuration.

properties.name: Greengrass
properties.description: A gateway that runs on AWS IoT Greengrass V1.

type.description: A gateway that runs on AWS IoT Greengrass V1.

properties.name: GreengrassV2
properties.description: A gateway that runs on AWS IoT Greengrass V2.

type.description: A gateway that runs on AWS IoT Greengrass V2.

Greengrass.description: Contains the ARN of AWS IoT Greengrass Group V1 that the gateway runs on.

properties.name: GroupArn
properties.description: The ARN of the Greengrass group.

type.description: The ARN of the Greengrass group.

GreengrassV2.description: Contains the CoreDeviceThingName of AWS IoT Greengrass Group V2 that the gateway runs on.

properties.name: CoreDeviceThingName
properties.description: The name of the CoreDevice in GreenGrass V2.

type.description: The name of the CoreDevice in GreenGrass V2.

Tag.description: To add or update tag, provide both key and value. To delete tag, provide only tag key to be deleted

properties.name: GatewayCapabilitySummaries
properties.description: A list of gateway capability summaries that each contain a namespace and status.

type.description: A list of gateway capability summaries that each contain a namespace and status.

properties.name: GatewayName
properties.description: A unique, friendly name for the gateway.

type.description: A unique, friendly name for the gateway.

properties.name: GatewayPlatform
properties.description: The gateway's platform. You can only specify one platform in a gateway.

type.description: The gateway's platform. You can only specify one platform in a gateway.

properties.name: Tags
properties.description: A list of key-value pairs that contain metadata for the gateway.

type.description: A list of key-value pairs that contain metadata for the gateway.

properties.name: GatewayId
properties.description: The ID of the gateway device.

type.description: The ID of the gateway device.
